00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_pointerlist.h"
00029 #include <QObject>
00030 
00031 class KviChannel;
00032 class KviQuery;
00033 class KviQuery;
00034 class KviFrame;
00035 class KviIrcConnection;
00036 class KviExternalServerDataParser;
00037 class KviAsynchronousConnectionData;
00038 class KviIrcDataStreamMonitor;
00039 class KviWindow;
00040 class QTimer;
00041 class KviConsole;
00042 class KviNetwork;
00043 class KviServer;
00044 /*
00045         KviIrcContext is the structure that groups the objects and resources
00046         usable for a single irc connection: a console, a set of channels and queries,
00047         and a KviIrcConnection object.
00048 
00049         The objects grouped here are mostly permanent across connections.
00050 
00051         Each irc context has its own unique numeric identifier. The identifiers start
00052         from 1 so 0 is an invalid irc context id (this is useful in the scripting engine).
00053 
00054         The irc context is created in the KviConsole constructor and destroyed
00055         in the KviConsole destructor. No other class can allocate KviIrcContext objects.
00056 */
00057 
00058 class KVIRC_API KviIrcContext : public QObject
00059 {
00060         friend class KviConsole;
00061         friend class KviChannel;
00062         friend class KviQuery;
00063         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00064         friend class KviIrcContextToolBar;
00065         Q_OBJECT
00066 protected:
00067         KviIrcContext(KviConsole * pConsole); // only KviConsole can create this
00068 public:
00069         ~KviIrcContext();
00070 public:
00071         enum State
00072         {
00073                 Idle,         // connection() == 0
00074                 Connecting,   // connection() != 0
00075                 LoggingIn,    // connection() != 0
00076                 Connected     // connection() != 0
00077         };
00078 protected:
00079         KviConsole                       * m_pConsole;             // shallow, never null
00080         KviIrcConnection                 * m_pConnection;
00081 
00082         unsigned int                       m_uId;                  // this irc context id
00083 
00084         State                              m_eState;               // this context state
00085 
00086         // helper pointers
00087         KviFrame                         * m_pFrame;               // the owning frame, shallow, never null
00088 
00089         // permanent links and list window
00090         KviExternalServerDataParser      * m_pLinksWindow;
00091         KviExternalServerDataParser      * m_pListWindow;
00092 
00093         KviAsynchronousConnectionData    * m_pAsynchronousConnectionData; // owned, may be null
00094         KviAsynchronousConnectionData    * m_pSavedAsynchronousConnectionData; // owned, may be null, this is used to reconnect to the last server in this context
00095 
00096         unsigned int                       m_uConnectAttemptCount;
00097         QTimer                           * m_pReconnectTimer;
00098 
00099         KviPointerList<KviIrcDataStreamMonitor> * m_pMonitorList; // owned, may be null
00100 
00101         // dead channels and queries
00102         KviPointerList<KviChannel>           * m_pDeadChannels;
00103         KviPointerList<KviQuery>             * m_pDeadQueries;
00104         // other context bound windows
00105         KviPointerList<KviWindow>            * m_pContextWindows;
00106 
00107         int                                m_iHeartbeatTimerId;
00108 public:
00109         inline unsigned int id(){ return m_uId; };
00110         // never null and always the same!
00111         inline KviConsole * console(){ return m_pConsole; };
00112         // never null and always the same
00113         inline KviFrame * frame(){ return m_pFrame; };
00114         // may be null and may change!
00115         inline KviIrcConnection * connection(){ return m_pConnection; };
00116         // state
00117         inline State state(){ return m_eState; };
00118         inline bool isConnected(){ return m_eState == Connected; };
00119         inline bool isLoggingIn(){ return m_eState == LoggingIn; };
00120         // dead channels and queries
00121         void closeAllDeadChannels();
00122         void closeAllDeadQueries();
00123         bool unregisterDeadChannel(KviChannel * c);
00124         bool unregisterDeadQuery(KviQuery * q);
00125         void registerDeadChannel(KviChannel * c);
00126         void registerDeadQuery(KviQuery * q);
00127         KviChannel * findDeadChannel(const QString &name);
00128         KviQuery * findDeadQuery(const QString &nick);
00129         KviQuery * firstDeadQuery();
00130         // other windows bound to the context
00131         void closeAllContextWindows();
00132         void registerContextWindow(KviWindow * pWnd);
00133         bool unregisterContextWindow(KviWindow * pWnd);
00134 
00135         inline KviPointerList<KviIrcDataStreamMonitor> * monitorList(){ return m_pMonitorList; };
00136 
00137         // links window
00138         void createLinksWindow();
00139         inline void setLinksWindowPointer(KviExternalServerDataParser * l){ m_pLinksWindow = l; };
00140         inline KviExternalServerDataParser * linksWindow(){ return m_pLinksWindow; };
00141 
00142         // list window
00143         void createListWindow();
00144         inline void setListWindowPointer(KviExternalServerDataParser * l){ m_pListWindow = l; };
00145         inline KviExternalServerDataParser * listWindow(){ return m_pListWindow; };
00146 
00147         void setAsynchronousConnectionData(KviAsynchronousConnectionData * d);
00148         inline KviAsynchronousConnectionData * asynchronousConnectionData(){ return m_pAsynchronousConnectionData; };
00149         void destroyAsynchronousConnectionData();
00150         // used by KviConsole (for now) and KviUserParser
00151         void connectToCurrentServer();
00152 
00153         void beginAsynchronousConnect(unsigned int uDelayInMSecs);
00154 
00155         void registerDataStreamMonitor(KviIrcDataStreamMonitor * m);
00156         void unregisterDataStreamMonitor(KviIrcDataStreamMonitor *m);
00157 
00158         void terminateConnectionRequest(bool bForce,const QString &szQuitMessage = QString(),bool bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect = false);
00159 
00160 protected:
00161         // called by KviIrcContextToolBar: this will DIE in favor of connectOrDisconnect()
00162         void connectButtonClicked();
00163         // used by KviConsole (for now)
00164         void destroyConnection();
00165         // for KviConsole (for now) . later will be used only internally
00166         void setState(State eState);
00167         // called by KviIrcConnection
00168         void loginComplete();
00169         // our heartbeat timer event
00170         virtual void timerEvent(QTimerEvent *e);
00171 public:
00172         void connectOrDisconnect(){ connectButtonClicked(); };
00173 protected:
00174         //
00175         // KviIrcConnection interface
00176         //
00177         void connectionFailed(int iError);
00178         void connectionEstabilished();
00179         void connectionTerminated();
00180 signals:
00181         void stateChanged();
00182 protected slots:
00183         void asynchronousConnect();
00184         void unhighlightAllWindows();
00185 };
